input_text.Prompt:
Conversation:
Matt: Is this the workshop to prepare for an interview?
Barbara: This is the interview class. Welcome to our class.
Matt: I am really excited to be taking this workshop so that I can get ready for my interview next week.
Barbara: We are all learning things that will help us in our interview. What do you think are some important considerations going into your interview?
Matt: I think that we should dress neatly and appropriately.
Barbara: Yes. Second, as you can imagine, attitude and friendliness go a long way.
Matt: Yes, and I always feel much better when I am friendly.
Barbara: Believe it or not, the interviewers are as interested in your questions as they are in your answers.
Matt: Any more hints as to what I should do in an interview?
Barbara: Always be honest with your answers. The interviewers really do want to know if you will be a good fit for them.

Now write a summary of the conversation:
input_text.Response A: In this conversation, Matt is excited to attend the interview workshop because he has an upcoming interview. He believes that dressing neatly and appropriately is important, as well as a positive attitude. Barbara emphasizes the importance of friendliness and the interviewer's interest in the candidate's questions. She also advises honesty and a good fit with the company.
input_text.Response B: Matt is preparing for an interview and is attending an interview workshop. Barbara gives Matt some helpful advice on interviewing including being well-groomed, friendly, and honest. Barbara encourages Matt to also ask questions of the interviewers.

label_annotations.feedback: Response A summarized the conversation in a more detailed manner that was consistent with the request in terms of using the same wording to summarize what was said.
